headerDisplay: This plugin works with Denon/Marantz AV Receivers. Devices are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired.

generation.title: Generation
generation.description: Here select generation of Your device.

zoneControl.title: Zone/Mode Control
zoneControl.description: Here select which Zone You want control.

getInputsFromDevice.title: Load Inputs From Device
getInputsFromDevice.description: If enabled, all Inputs will be loaded direct from device.

getFavoritesFromDevice.title: Load Favorites
getFavoritesFromDevice.description: If enabled, all Favorites will be loaded direct from device, only if exist.

getQuickSmartSelectFromDevice.title: Load Quick/Smart Select
getQuickSmartSelectFromDevice.description: If enabled, all Quick/Smart Select will be loaded direct from device, only if exist.

inputsDisplayOrder.title: Display Order
inputsDisplayOrder.description: Here select display order of the inputs list.

oneOf.title: ZM INPUT NAPSTER (EU and NA Only)
ZM SOUND MODE MOVIE (Multi Ch Stetreo)
ZM SOUND MODE MUSIC (Multi Ch Stereo)
ZM SOUND MODE GAME (Multi Ch Stereo)
ZM CHANNELS RESET TO FACTORY DEFAULT
ZM AUDIO DIGITAL INPUT MODE AUTO
ZM AUDIO DIGITAL INPUT MODE PCM
ZM AUDIO DIGITAL INPUT MODE DTS
ZM LFE LEVEL IN 7.1 CH MODE 0
ZM LFE LEVEL IN 7.1 CH MODE 5
ZM LFE LEVEL IN 7.1 CH MODE 10
ZM LFE LEVEL IN 7.1 CH MODE 15
ZM AUDYSSEY LFC CONTAINMENT AMOUNT UP
ZM AUDYSSEY LFC CONTAINMENT AMOUNT DOWN
ZM RC GUI SOURCE SELECT MENU ON
ZM RC GUI SOURCE SELECT MENU OFF
ZM RC MENU CHANNEL LEVEL ADJUST
ZM RC OFF FOR PANEL BUTTON EXCEPT MASTER VOL.
ZM RC OFF FOR PANEL BUTTON & MASTER VOL.
ZM RC ON FOR PANEL BUTTON & MASTER VOL.
ZM TUNER CONTROL SEEK+ (ALSO DAB STATION)
ZM TUNER CONTROL SEEK- (ALSO DAB STATION)
ZM TUNER TUNING MODE AUTO (EXCEPT DAB)
ZM TUNER TUNING MODE MANUAL (EXCEPT DAB)
ZM TUNER DAB DYNAMIC RANGE ONE
ZM TUNER DAB DYNAMIC RANGE HLF
ZM TUNER DAB DYNAMIC RANGE OFF
ZM TUNER DAB STATION ORDER ALPHANUMERIC
ZM TUNER DAB STATION ORDER MULTIPLEX

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select characteristic type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for button name.

oneOf.title: Z2 INPUT NAPSTER (EU and NA Only)

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select characteristic type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for button name.

oneOf.title: Z3 INPUT NAPSTER (EU and NA Only)

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select characteristic type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for button name.

sensorPower.title: Power
sensorPower.description: This expose Power as a Contact Sensor, fired if power ON.

sensorVolume.title: Volume
sensorVolume.description: This expose Volume as a Contact Sensor, fired on every Volume change.

sensorMute.title: Mute
sensorMute.description: This expose Mute as a Contact Sensor, fired if Mmute ON.

sensorInput.title: Input
sensorInput.description: This expose Input/Surround as a Contact Sensor, fired on every Input change.

items.title: Input
items.description: Here create sensors based on reference, fired if switch to it.

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select characteristic type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sensor name.

items.title: Surround
items.description: Here create sensors based on reference, fired if switch to it.

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select characteristic type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sensor name.

infoButtonCommand.title: Info Button
infoButtonCommand.description: Here select the function of info button in RC.

masterPower.title: Master Power Control
masterPower.description: The power switch for that zone will turn the entire receiver *ON* or *OFF/STANDBY* rather than just the zone itself.

masterMute.title: Master Mute Control
masterMute.description: The mute switch for that zone will muted the entire receiver *ON* or *OFF* rather than just the zone itself.

masterVolume.title: Master Volume Control
masterVolume.description: The volume for that zone will set the entire receiver volume *UP* or *DOWN* rather than just the zone itself.

volumeControlNamePrefix.title: Volume Control Name Prefix
volumeControlNamePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for volume control name.

volumeControlName.title: Volume Control Name
volumeControlName.description: Here set Your own volume control name or leave empty.

volumeControl.title: Volume Control Mode
volumeControl.description: Here select what a volume control mode You want to use. If select *None/Disabled* only hardware buttons in RC app can be used to control volume.

volumeMax.title: Max Volume (%)
volumeMax.description: Here set the max possible volume to set.

refreshInterval.title: Refresh interval (sec)
refreshInterval.description: Here set the background data refresh interval.

disableLogDeviceInfo.title: Disable Log Device Info
disableLogDeviceInfo.description: This disable logging device info by every connections device to the network.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: This enable debug mode for RESTFul.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the listening Port for RESTful server.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: This enable debug mode for MQTT.

host.title: IP/Hostname
host.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Here optional set the Client ID of MQTT Broker.

auth.title: Authorization
auth.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

user.title: User
user.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices].mqtt.enable === true && model.devices[arrayIndices].mqtt.auth === true && model.devices[arrayIndices].zoneControl < 3;

passwd.title: Password
passwd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices].mqtt.enable === true && model.devices[arrayIndices].mqtt.auth === true && model.devices[arrayIndices].zoneControl < 3;
